title: Privacy first
text: All processing happens on your device—no data ever leaves your phone. Your conversations, documents, and personal information remain private and secure.

title: Context-aware chats
text: Upload any PDF and chat with AI based on its content. Ask questions, extract insights, and get summaries without switching between apps.

title: Local speech-to-text
text: Speak naturally to your AI assistant with on-device speech recognition. Your voice is transcribed locally, keeping your conversations completely private.

title: Platform agnostic
text: Private Mind is available on iOS and Android. Enjoy the same features and smooth performance regardless of the system.

title: Customizable prompts
text: Create custom system prompts to shape how your AI responds. Whether you need a coding assistant, creative partner, or study buddy—make it yours.

title: Truly offline
text: No internet? No problem. Use your AI assistant anywhere—on flights, in remote areas, or underground. Full functionality, zero connectivity required.
